about.headline: About me
about.text1: Hi, I'm Manuel, a frontend developer from Partenstein. Through working on numerous projects, I have acquired the skills to program both static websites and complex business applications.
about.text2: I love engaging with new technologies and learning about them. As a developer, I can now integrate this passion into my professional daily life.
about.text3: Below, you will find an overview of my skills and some projects where I have applied them. I am pleased that you have found your way to my site.

skills.headline: My skills
skills.text: I have grown my frontend development skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.

portfolio.headline: Portfolio
portfolio.text: Explore a selection of my work here - interact with projects to see my skills in action.

project1.text: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

project2.text: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the killer chicken.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.text1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.privacy3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

popup.headline: Message Sent
popup.text: Your message has been successfully sent. We will contact you soon.
